page.title: 04Shopping centre, Swindon.
page.content: Regent street is the main shopping street. Recently it has been made into a traffic-free pedestrian precinct. Some people can remember when trams ran up and down it.The street has been paved,sitting areas built and trees planted.There are always crowds of people here. This week a demonstration for 'animal liberation' was held,and this year there have been cash collections for striking coal-miners and for Ethiopian famine relief, drawings by pavement artists,and break-dance exhibitions. The Brunel centre is a new shopping complex linked to Regent street.It has a domed glass roof over the main concourse,with famous stores like Boots,Sainsbury's,Mark's and Spencers around it.A glass overhang shelters the pavements ,with baskets of flowers suspended from it.
